word: To a crowded assembly he spoke from the words of Christ, \93Peace be unto you.\94 \93Philosophers, doctors, and writers,\94 he said, \93have endeavored to teach men the way to obtain everlasting life, and they have not succeeded. I will now tell it to you.\94 \93God has raised one Man from the dead, the Lord Jesus Christ, that he might destroy death, expiate sin, and shut the gates of hell. This is the work of salvation. Christ has vanquished! This is the joyful news! And we are saved by his work, and not by our own. . . . Our Lord Jesus Christ said, \91Peace be unto you! behold my hands\92\97that is to say, Behold, O man! it is I, I alone, who have taken away thy sins, and ransomed thee; and now thou hast peace, saith the Lord.\94
